ThingDef.label: piscine genome
ThingDef.description:
A payload of piscine genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 1 genome can be used as either a primary or secondary genome.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All piscine hybrids have increased movement speed and resistances in water, but are generally cumbersome outside it.

<color=#E5E54C>Extraction:</color> Can be extracted by using the Monstrous Genome Excavator on a piscine wyvern corpse.
